registryIdentity.name: Permissioned Token Registry
registryIdentity.description: A permissioned registry of tokens on Bitcoin Cash maintained by zapit. Publishes names, symbols, icons, and other metadata about CashTokens via a Bitcoin Cash Metadata Registry (BCMR).

2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.name: Z Tokens
2023-05-12T20:18:04.000Z.description:
OpenTokenRegistry's example fungible token issued on mainnet, a network used for Bitcoin Cash development.

In user interfaces with limited space, descriptions may be hidden beyond 140 characters or the first newline character; this example allows for testing of hiding and revealing extended descriptions.
